metadata.name: Jeremiah Agenyi
metadata.title: Product Manager & Co-founder | Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Passionate and versatile professional at the intersection of technology, communication, and social impact. With over a decade of experience building exceptional digital experiences.

profile.headline: Product Manager & Co-founder || Architecting digital solutions
profile.about: I am a passionate and versatile professional at the intersection of technology, communication, and social impact. With over a decade of experience, I specialize in building exceptional digital experiences and leading technical teams.

experience.title: Lead Engineer
experience.description: Lead engineer delivering high-quality production code for diverse projects
highlights: Deliver high-quality, robust production code for diverse array of projects for clients including Harvard Business School, Everytown for Gun Safety, Pratt Institute, Koala Health, Vanderbilt University, The 19th News, and more
Work alongside creative directors to lead research, development, and architecture of technical solutions
Collaborate with designers, project managers, and other engineers to transform creative concepts into production realities
Provide leadership within engineering department through collaboration, knowledge shares, and mentorship

experience.title: UI Engineer Co-op
highlights: Developed and styled interactive web applications for Apple Music using Ember and SCSS
Built and shipped the Apple Music Extension for Facebook Messenger
Architected and implemented the user interface of Apple Music's embeddable web player widget
Contributed to the creation of MusicKit JS, a public-facing JavaScript SDK

experience.title: Software Engineer Co-op
experience.description: Software Engineer for Starry's customer-facing applications
highlights: Engineered and improved major features using ES6, Handlebars, Backbone, Marionette, and CSS
Proposed and implemented scalable solutions for cloud services
Collaborated with designers and developers on iOS and Android mobile apps

experience.title: Developer
highlights: Collaborated with student designers and engineers on pro-bono projects
Created new brands, design systems, and websites for community organizations
Built and delivered technical solutions according to stakeholder requirements

experience.title: Creative Technologist Co-op
highlights: Developed, maintained, and shipped production code using HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, and jQuery
Performed quality assurance tests for cross-browser compatibility
Worked with clients including JetBlue, Lovesac, U.S. Cellular, and U.S. Department of Defense

projects.title: Spotify Profile
projects.description: A web app for visualizing personalized Spotify data. View your top artists, top tracks, recently played tracks, and detailed audio information about each track.

projects.title: OctoProfile
projects.description: A nicer look at your GitHub profile and repo stats. Includes data visualizations of your top languages, starred repositories, and sort through your top repos.

projects.title: Halcyon Theme
projects.description: A minimal, dark blue theme for VS Code, Sublime Text, Atom, iTerm, and more.

projects.title: Google Keep Clone
projects.description: A simple Google Keep clone built with Vue and Firebase.

projects.title: Time to Have More Fun
projects.description: A single page web app for helping choose where to travel, built with Next.js, Firebase, and Tailwind CSS.

typography.fontFamily: Calibre, San Francisco, Segoe UI, Roboto, sans-serif
typography.monoFont: SF Mono, Monaco, Inconsolata, Courier New, monospace

hero.title: Hi, my name is
hero.name: Jeremiah Agenyi
hero.tagline: I build things for the web.
hero.description: I'm a software engineer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences.

about.title: About
about.content: I'm a passionate and versatile professional at the intersection of technology, communication, and social impact. With over a decade of experience, I specialize in building exceptional digital experiences and leading technical teams.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: My inbox is always open. Feel free to get in touch!
